001package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
002
003import static imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.StandardIlluminant.D50;
004import static imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.StandardIlluminant.D65;
005
006/**
007 * This interface specifies methods {@link #toCIEXYZ65(float[])} and
008 * {@link #fromCIEXYZ65(float[])} for direct conversion between the color
009 * space's native color values and D65 XYZ-coordinates. This is useful for color
010 * spaces that are D65-based by avoiding additional conversions to and from
011 * D50-based PCS.
012 * 
013 * @author WB
014 * @version 2022/11/15
015 */
016public interface DirectD65Conversion {
017        
018        static final ChromaticAdaptation catD65toD50 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D65, D50);
019        static final ChromaticAdaptation catD50toD65 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D50, D65);
020        
021        // methods required by all implementations of ColorSpace:
022        public float[] toCIEXYZ(float[] value);
023        public float[] fromCIEXYZ(float[] value);
024        public float[] toRGB(float[] value);
025        public float[] fromRGB(float[] value);
026        
027        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
028        
029        /**
030         * Analogous to {@link #fromCIEXYZ(float[])} but accepts D65-based instead of
031         * D50-based PCS color values. D65-based color spaces should override this
032         * method to avoid the additional D65 to D50 conversion.
033         * 
034         * @param xyz65 D65-based XYZ color values
035         * @return color values in this color space
036         */
037        public default float[] fromCIEXYZ65(float[] xyz65) {
038                float[] XYZ50 = catD65toD50.applyTo(xyz65);
039                return this.fromCIEXYZ(XYZ50);
040        }
041        
042        /**
043         * Analogous to {@link #toCIEXYZ(float[])} but returns D65-based instead of
044         * D50-based PCS color values. D65-based color spaces should override this
045         * method to avoid the additional D50 to D65 conversion.
046         * 
047         * @param value color value in this color space
048         * @return D65-based XYZ color values
049         */
050        public default float[] toCIEXYZ65(float[] value) {
051                float[] XYZ50 = this.toCIEXYZ(value);
052                return catD50toD65.applyTo(XYZ50);
053        }
054        
055}
